page.title: 01Parents and neighbourhood.
page.content:
{ FEELINGS ABOUT THE LOCALITY.}Based on the replies of ten parents of primary school children to a questionaire.
{LIKES.}Larger gardens, south facing aspect, open spaces. Proximity to work place . Fast access to motorways, areas of natural beauty and the facilities of big cities. Living and housing costs are reasonable. Friendly neighbours. Cheshire countryside. Social and sports clubs. { {DISLIKES.}Bus service (half hourly and none after 6pm). The New Town. Shopping City. Traffic. ICI and the concentration of the chemical industry locally; sight and smell of factories and their effect on the atmosphere. Disappearance of beautiful countryside for factories and housing estates.
